product.name: Colour Coats Coasters - (Set of 6)
product.description: These Coasters, which come in a set of six pieces, have vivid floral motifs spread over a printed background. Each square-shaped piece has a unique colour element to it.

product.name: Royal Palace Coasters - (Set of 6)
product.description: These Coasters, which come in a set of six pieces, have the royal palace, and overlapping the structure is a curtain of floral and design motifs. Each square-shaped piece has a unique colour and design element to it.

product.name: Car Rally Coasters - (Set of 6)
product.description: These Coasters, which come in a set of six, see the different moods and tones of city life?from busy streets to age-old buildings. Each piece has a unique colour and design element to it. The square-shaped coasters come with a base stand.

product.name: Rocking Raja Coasters - (Set of 6)
product.description: These Coasters, which come in a set of six, has the regal maharaja in the midst of a pretty flower. Each piece has a unique colour element to it. The square-shaped coasters come with a base stand.

product.name: Rustic Tones MDF Coasters - (Set of 6)
product.description: These Coasters, which come in a set of six, have the royal palace in various angles and colour tones?and literally make you want to travel back in time and experience the magic! Each piece has a unique colour and design element to it. The square-shaped coasters come with a base stand.

product.name: Cutting Chai MDF Coasters - (Set of 6)
product.description: These Coasters, which come in a set of six, will definitely make you say, ?Chai meets Chai!? when you put your cup of chai on it! Each piece has a unique colour element to it. The square-shaped coasters come with a base stand.

product.name: Elegant carvings Coasters - (Set of 6)
product.description: These Coasters, which come in a set of six, have ethnic Indian tones, along with a range of floral designs and shapes that are beautifully linked to each other. The square-shaped coasters come with a base stand.

product.name: Cutting Chai Mug
product.description: This Mug salutes the modest chai, the much-loved beverage of every Indian, all against a white background.

product.name: Truck Load Mug
product.description: This Mug celebrates the power and strength of the vibrant Indian truck, all against a white background.

product.name: Motor Cycle Magic Mug
product.description: This Mug brings alive the bicycle ? the mode of transport that is business for some, sport for some, and simply a pleasure ride for the rest. The image of the bicycle is set against a white background, which has a spectrum of colours on it.

product.name: Auto - Rickshaw Fun Mug
product.description: This Mug will take you on a Shandar Sawari, or a magical and enjoyable ride in the auto rickshaw, the mode of transport that will always be the pulse of any Indian city.

product.name: Faces Mug
product.description: This Mug will make you laugh, laugh, and laugh some more, as it has so much fun in the form of some crazy and whacky faces.

product.name: Floral Peacock Dance Coffee Mug
product.description: This Coffee Mug has the gorgeous peacock enjoying the company of beautiful red flowers.

product.name: Colourful Fish Mug
product.description: This Coffee Mug sees a variety of colourful fishes, each graced with a lovely design on it. They are all set against a white background.

product.name: Maharaja's Sword Mug
product.description: This Mug has the royal Maharaja commanding authority with his mighty sword. A play of grey and colourful rays adds drama to the design.

product.name: Royally Hers Mug
product.description: This Mug has a beautiful sketch of the regal Maharani, decked in her finest jewels and adornments, all against a white background. The ceramic mug measures 3.8x3.26-inch (height x diameter).

product.name: Royally His Mug
product.description: This Mug brings alive the magnificent Maharaja through the magic of sketch work, all against a white background.

product.name: Palace Scene Miniature Mug
product.description: This Mug sees the ladies of the yesteryears chatting, along with a range of beautiful flowers, and all the grandeur of the royal times.

product.name: Spectrum Ikat Mug
product.description: This Coffee Mug has a colourful canvas of soothing yet stunning designs, shapes and styles doing all the talking.

product.name: Chirping Birds Mug
product.description: This Mug sees a flock of beautiful black birds enjoying themselves on twigs and branches, and a pretty little pink bird brings in a respite of colour.

product.name: Shadow Palace Mug
product.description: This Shadow Palace Mug brings together a black-and-white sketch of the royal palace, and the beauty of some exquisite flowers, all against a white background.

product.name: Pink Paisleys Mug
product.description: This Mug has an attractive pink-coloured paisley sitting in the centre of green-coloured square-shaped designs.

product.description: This iPad Sleeve has an intricately-designed pink paisley, a design and shape that has a truly Indian and ethnic charm to it.

product.name: Neo- Nawab Lotus Courtesan Mug
product.description: This Neo-Nawab Mug geatures a Mughal belle as she pines for her lover by a gorgeous garden pond.

product.name: Lotus Prince Mug
product.description: This Neo-Nawab Mug features a handsome prince as he recites some of his favorite poetry in the company of a delicate palace bird, amidst a backdrop of mesmerising flora and botany.

product.name: Grooving Palms Mug
product.description: This Mug features a a pair of entangled palm trees as they sway in and out of each other's embrace, by the palace stables.

product.name: Indian Rose Mug
product.description: This Mug celebrates the Indian Rose in all her regality and provocateur as she blossoms by a marble palace screen.

product.name: Blissful Lotus Mug
product.description: This Blissful Lotus Mug features a bouquet of lotuses in bloom after all the palace courtiers have retired to bed. The lotuses continue to celebrate the beauty of dusk and silence as they bloom and radiate their intoxicating fragrance.

product.name: Cosmic Courtesan Mug
product.description: This Neo-Nawab Mug features a troupe of courtesans celebratinh the initiation of a new season at midnight with song and dance against a decadently manicured garden.

product.name: Royal Peacock Mug
product.description: This Mug features a Royal peacock who seeks a moment of solitude in the palace gardens.

product.name: Peacock's Palace Mug
product.description: This Mug features a stylized rendition of the palace zoo, replete with exotic peacocks, golden deer, and gem-tinted nightingales.

product.name: City Nostalgia
product.description: This exquisite art work highlights the grand old days of Mumbai by featuring some of the most iconic locations using deco-style architecture in the city. This piece makes you feel like taking a trip down memory lane. Digitally printed, hand painted and embroidered. Archival canvas on Mounted Stretcher.

product.name: Retro Hue
product.description: This art work takes you back to the days when Mumbai was uber chic and deco-style architecture was the design norm. This piece gives you a retro appeal taking you straight back to the glory days of this city. Digitally printed, hand painted and embroidered. Archival canvas on Mounted Stretcher.

product.name: Stallion Black
product.description: This beautiful piece pays tribute to the artistic movement in Mumbai. Using iconic landmarks of the art-deco scene as visual motifs, this piece reminds us how Mumbai was and still is a bastion of culture. Digitally printed, hand painted and embroidered. Archival canvas on Mounted Stretcher.

product.name: Chromatic Reminiscence
product.description: This art work pays homage to the grandeur of art-deco architecture of one of the most iconic structures in Mumbai. Digitally printed, hand painted and embroidered. Archival canvas on Mounted Stretcher.

product.name: Neon Dreams
product.description: This piece of art highlights the intricacy of detail found in beautiful art-deco structures found in Mumbai. Digitally printed, hand painted and embroidered. Archival canvas on Mounted Stretcher.

product.name: City of Windows
product.description: This art work pays attention to the beauty of the art-deco style windows which dot the landscape of Mumbai. Digitally printed, hand painted and embroidered. Archival canvas on Mounted Stretcher.

product.name: Arch Fuschia
product.description: This art piece brings out the beauty of the art-deco buildings in Mumbai. It highlights the fact that Mumbai has a vibrant and interesting heritage. Digitally printed, hand painted and embroidered. Archival canvas on Mounted Stretcher.

product.name: Deco Pop
product.description: This art work brings out the elegance and sophistication found in the art-deco architecture of Mumbai. The aesthetic appeal of this building make it visually unforgettable. Digitally printed, hand painted and embroidered. Archival canvas on mounted Stretcher.

product.name: Viva La Traffic Jam Tie
product.description: This Viva La Traffic Jam Tie celebrates the vibrant chaos of the ubiqutious Indian traffic jam, complete with red buses, tooting ricksaws, and guzzling taxis.

product.name: Cutting Chai Tie
product.description: This eclectic and vibrant tie celebrates the street culture of Bombay. With its quirky motifs, this tie is definitely one of a kind.

product.name: Funky Slippers Tie
product.description: There couldn't have been a better and more appropriate visual synonym. This Funky Slippers Tie has elegant pairs of ethnic chappals, the beautiful and colourful designs all over the tie.

product.name: Mystic Cow Tie
product.description: The iconic cow just got a magical and fun twist with this tie. With a crisp blue background, the design of this tie is extremly elegant and unique.

product.name: Auto Fun Tie
product.description: This tie is fun and quirky. With an interesting take on autos, this tie is vibrant and very chic.

product.name: Namaste India Tie
product.description: This tie welcomes you to India! It features a series of iconic hallmarks of the nation, including The Gateway of India, rickshaw's, chai, and even elephants and peacocks!

product.name: Chromatic RickTie
product.description: This Chromatic Rick Tie showcases a brilliant graphic of intensely hued richshaw's in a fun repeat pattern.

product.name: Stunning SlippersTie
product.description: This Stunning Slippers Tie, is eclectic and fun. On a bright blue background rest these Stunning Slippers. Which one is your favourite?

product.name: Cycle Ride Rubber Coasters - (Set of 6)
product.description: These coasters depicts the cycle rickshaw, which was one the most commonly-used mode of transports in India at one point of time.

product.name: Pop-Slippers Rubber Coasters - (Set of 6)
product.description: This Pop-Slipper coaster set celebrates the Kolhapuri chappals and the new age fashion statement that it creates.

product.name: City Grand Colour Rubber Coasters - (Set of 6)
product.description: This exquisite coaster set depicts the grandness of a city, with all its glorious colours.

product.name: Purple Tree Warli Rubber Coasters - (Set of 6)
product.description: This Purple Tree Warli Coaster set has the intricate design of a pretty coloured tree, placed on a contrasting pink-coloured background. This elegant sling bag is sure to catch all the attention.

product.name: Flaming Flower Rubber Coasters - (Set of 6)
product.description: This coaster set is bright and vibrant and will add that touch of colour to your table.

product.name: Fern Forest Rubber Coasters - (Set of 6)
product.description: This coaster set is unique and elegant. With a myriad of colours and patterns, this coaster set is a must have.

product.name: Umbrellas Rubber Coasters - (Set of 6)
product.description: This Umbrellas coaster set will make you fall in love with the scenic and romantic season of the monsoons! The designs of these small and big umbrellas, in a variety of pop colours, can instantly brighten up the dullest of days.
